timeline.bodyText: How about "Invalid truncate width: %s"? We try to keep error messages a bit shorter and clearer, with the most useful information up front. In this case, the problem is that the truncate width is invalid. We can also add more clarification if you want, like "Invalid truncate width: %s (must be > 0)"
